basics.name: Gwendal Beaumont
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: Gratuated in Computer Science Engineering in 2023, I now pursue a PhD in the field of Digital Twins and DevOps.

work.name: Miami University, Oxford, OH, USA
work.summary: Internship as an assistant in the preparation of a master thesis on the effect of errors in agent-based simulation systems.
highlights: State of the art on the topic of errors representation in computer simulation
Creation of a simulation framework in Python to take errors into account
Creation of multiple agent-based simulation in Python to test our framework

work.name: ALTEN Labs, Rennes, FR
work.summary: Research intership on the labelling process of data in order to be used with Machine Learning algorithm.

volunteer.summary: Member of the communications managers team for the student council during a year.

volunteer.position: Ph.D. Students representative at the board of directors
volunteer.summary: IMT PhD Students representative at the national level for two years. I took part in the board of directors of the Institute and a work group that works towards respect and egality.
highlights: Creation of a national Ph.D. students network
Creation of national events for Ph.D. students

publications.name: A Scoping Review of Three Dimensions for Long-Term COVID-19 Vaccination Models: Hybrid Immunity, Individual Drivers of Vaccinal Choice, and Human Errors
A framework for the comparison of errors in agent-based models using machine learning
